import React, { Fragment, useState } from 'react'; import { Video, Details, Brand } from '../../../../../../../../constant'; import { TabContent, TabPane, Nav, NavItem, NavLink, Row, Col, Card, Button, Input, CardBody, Label, CardHeader, Form, Media } from 'reactstrap'; import { ThumbsUp, Gift, CreditCard, Clock } from 'react-feather'; import Skeleton, { SkeletonTheme } from 'react-loading-skeleton'; import "../../styles.css"; import moment from "moment"; import _ from "lodash"; const TabsetIndividualLiveListingHelper = ({ passedData, ready, user }) => { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('1'); console.log("user", user); const notSpecified = "Not Specified."; return (
setActiveTab('1')}> {"Poster/User Information"}
setActiveTab('2')}> {Video}
setActiveTab('3')}> {Details}
setActiveTab('4')}> {Brand}
{ready === true ?
  • {passedData.likes} have liked this listing!
  • {"Username"}

    {user.username}

  • {"Age"}

    {_.has(user, "birthdate") ? moment(user.birthdate).fromNow(true) + "Years old" : notSpecified}

  • {"Completed Gigs/Jobs W/Years Of EXP"}

    {_.has(user, "completedJobs") ? _.has(user, "yearsOfExperience") ? `${user.completedJobs} completed jobs/gigs W/${user.yearsOfExperience.value} years of experience` : `${user.completedJobs} completed jobs/gigs` : notSpecified}

  • {_.has(passedData, "likes") ? passedData.likes : notSpecified} have liked this listing!
  • {"Full Name"}

    {`${user.firstName} ${user.lastName}`}

  • {"'About Me'"}

    {user.aboutMe}

  • {"Public Email Address (@)"}

    {_.has(user, "publicEmailAddress") ? user.publicEmailAddress : notSpecified}

  • {`${process.env.REACT_APP_APPLICATION_NAME} RANK/LVL`}

    Level #{user.rankLevel}

  • {"Registered"}

    {moment(user.registrationDate).fromNow()}

  • {"Title"}

    {_.has(user, "title") ? user.title : notSpecified}

 :

} {ready === true ?

{"Hashtags/Relevant-Tags (Searchable)"}

{passedData.hashtags ? passedData.hashtags.map((tag, index) => { return {tag.text}; }) : null}

: null}
